label: CurrencyExchange
comment: The conversion of one currency to another.

datatypeProperties.comment: The rate factor used for conversion from the source currency to the target currency for trade purposes.
The date, time, date time or other date time value of the conversion rate for this trade related currency exchange.
The code specifying the source currency of a trade related currency conversion.
The numeric unit basis of the source currency used in this trade related currency exchange rate calculation.
The code specifying the target currency of a trade related currency conversion.
The numeric unit basis of the target currency used in this trade related currency exchange rate calculation.
The unique identifier of the currency exchange market from which the exchange rate is taken for trade purposes.

objectProperties.comment: An associated document referenced for this trade related currency exchange.

referencedBy.comment: The actual trade currency exchange for this trade allowance charge.
A currency exchange applicable to an insurance charge for this supply chain consignment.
The currency exchange applicable to the order currency in this header trade settlement.
The currency exchange applicable to the price in this header trade settlement.
The currency exchange applicable to the quotation currency in this header trade settlement.
A currency exchange applicable to a service charge for this supply chain consignment.
A currency exchange applicable to a tax in this header trade settlement.
